author: DistroTube
description:
On this episode of HEY DT:
0:00 Intro
0:18 How's your AI integration progress in your linux workflow?
1:25 As your videos are licensed as creative commons. Would it be okay if I used them to train a voice model on your voice?
2:30 Can you tell us what trading software is available on Linux, either on this or your other channel? 
4:17 You dropped your video an hour late today, what was the hold up?
5:58 Don't say Arch doesn't force you to use stuff cause I run the base arch with the archinstall installer and if I select pulseaudio...
7:01 I want to put my emacs config on github, but I can't figure out the right gitignore...
8:30 From your experience what is the best way to learn the command line...man/info pages or books/wiki?
10:00 Are you sure the creator allowed you to use elementary OS?
11:11 Not many people are talking about it, but what are your thoughts on the NixOS situation?

WANT TO SUPPORT THE CHANNEL? 
💰 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/distrotube 
💳 Paypal: https://www.yo
title: Hey, DT! What's Your Thoughts On The NixOS Drama?
